interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: IPL Hair Removal | Laser Hair Removal For Women - Upgraded 999,999 Flashes with 2 Flash Windows, Permanent Hair Removal For Legs, Arms, Underarm, Face,Bikini Line,Chest. (white& golden) Gift (white)
Review Date: 2021/10/16
Store: MELUN
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'MELUN', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Included Components': 'Charger', 'Head Type': 'Foil', 'Number of Blades': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '8.6 x 7.5 x 3.1 inches; 1.45 Pounds', 'UPC': '653846877987'}
Review Text: It arrived as described with two shielding glasses and a razor. The product itself is easy to use and the buttons on it are easy to figure out and operate. I got this product a few weeks ago so it's still too early to tell about its efficacy (which is why I gave it 4 stars but will update a few months from now when results can be actually measured). There are a few things I've already noticed however, on the sections where I've been using it the hair seems to be growing a bit thinner and taking also a bit longer to grow back. I'm comparing results by leaving a patch next to the area I'm treating alone and seeing how fast they both grow, the treated area seems to be lagging behind by a couple of days. We'll see what happens in a few months after which I will update.
Review Title: Works well - have to be consistent.
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

This 7oz spray bottle has an adjustable nozzle and translucent bottle to easily see liquid levels. It can be used for a variety of home and garden application. Looks neat but small Eyeshadow Makeup Palette Matte Shimmer Glitter Eyeshadow Pallet High Pigmented Long Lasting Professional Metallic Eye Shadows Waterproof Make-Up 35 Colors (01) SACE LADY {'Brand': 'SACE LADY', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Matte, Long lasting', 'Product Benefits': 'Long Lasting', 'Product Dimensions': '7.95 x 4.09 x 0.47 inches; 0.04 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AMZ-SL326'} I love the colors! and the pigment is amazing. it is super smooth and blends really well! I was happy to see it didn't break in shipping and was packaged well. I actually really like the pallet case its simple. Nice pallets! Keratin Secrets Do It Yourself Home Keratin System Keratin Secrets {'Package Dimensions': '8.27 x 4.21 x 3.9 inches; 2.87 Pounds'} Keratin’s make the hair smoother (NOT STRAIGHT), shinier, and frizzy free for up to 8 months depending on the strength of the product. Keratin treatments rebound the keratin in your hair so that they are all put back into place. There are a lot of steps but don’t get discouraged because they’re quiet simple. To start of give 2 good shampoos with a clarifying shampoo (specifically the keratin complex one, then towel dry and blow dry the unconditioned hair. Once fully dry, make small sections and apply the treatment from roots to ends and comb through with a fine tooth comb to make sure hair is fully saturated. Let that sit for 30 minutes then blow dry again without washing out the product. Once fully dry the final step will be to straighten the hair with a flatiron so the keratin will set in your hair. After you’re completely done you won’t be able to wash your hair for up to 3 days depending on the strength in the solution. Smooth long curls Magnetic Eyelashes With Eyeliner Kit,10 Pairs Eyelashes Magnetic 2021 Upgraded 3D Fluffy Natural Waterproof Reusable Fox Eyes Kit False Eyelashes And Eyeliner. I have the liquid one as well and I feel that that one holds the mascara a little more but it is stickier so I really wanted the pen to work especially for the wing.
